participant_1.background:
My weight is not something that I want to discuss.
My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things.
i like watching tv in my free time as well.
i work at a coffee house.
I am content with my solitary lifestyle and enjoy spending time with my pets.

participant_2.background:
I'm not rich but I do have a lot of pictures and stories to share from my travels.
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
My biggest fear is that I will work myself up so much that I will become ill.
I like to watch old movies from my childhood to feel like a kid again.
i have a toddler.

content.text: Hi there! What do you enjoy doing for fun?
Hi there! I love to go on adventures and travel to new places. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
That sounds fun! I love to travel too, but I'm not very adventurous. I like to relax and enjoy the sights and sounds of new places.
That's great! I love to try new things and experience different cultures.
What's your favorite place that you've traveled to?
I have to say, my favorite place is Japan. The culture is so different from my own and I love the food!
Japan sounds like a great place to visit! I've always wanted to go there.
You should go! It's so much fun!
I'll try to make it there someday!
I hope you do!
Thanks! What do you do for work?
I'm a stay-at-home mom to my toddler.
That must be a lot of work!
It is, but it's also really rewarding.
I bet! I'm sure your toddler loves you very much.
He does! He's my little sunshine.
That's so sweet!
Thanks!
You're welcome!
It was nice talking to you!
You too
